_header: Remember man the pain and smart
_description: A remembrance of the Passion — two 10-line stanzas

BLHar4826.First Lines:
Remember man the payne and smartWhich christes for the on earthe
                    did beare…
BLHar4826.Last Lines:
…These wordis of ioyfull blessednesseCom to me
                    frende
